Package it.polimi.ingsw.observer.messages

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoardChange
    Message that notifies to all the player that the board has changed, after a new move/build.
    BuildRequest
    Message request of new build
    EndTurnRequest
    Request to end a player turn
    MoveRequest
    Request to move a worker in a new cell
    PlayerLose
    A message that notifies a player that he has lost the game.
    ResetTurn
    Message that reset the number of all the actions of a player.
    Win
    Message that notifies to a player that he has won the game.
